Identification.ShortTitle: Advance Income Tax Ruling Fees Order
Identification.LongTitle: Order Prescribing the Fee To Be Paid by a Person to whom a Service is Provided in Respect of a Request for an Advance Income Tax Ruling from the Department of National Revenue

Provision.Text: The Minister of National Revenue, pursuant to paragraph 19(b) of the Financial Administration Act and Order in Council P.C. 1989-1949 of September 28, 1989*, hereby revokes the Department of National Revenue (Taxation) Advance Rulings Fees Order, made on May 25, 1983**, and makes the annexed Order prescribing the fee to be paid by a person to whom a service is provided in respect of a request for an advance income tax ruling from the Department of National Revenue in substitution therefor.

Footnote.Text: SI/89-217, 1989 Canada Gazette Part II, p. 4470
SOR/83-485, 1983 Canada Gazette Part II, p. 2397

Section.Text: This Order may be cited as the Advance Income Tax Ruling Fees Order.

The fee payable by a person who requests the Minister of National Revenue to provide an advance income tax ruling is $100 for each of the first 10 hours or part of an hour and $155 for each subsequent hour or part of an hour that is spent in preparing the ruling, whether or not the request is withdrawn.
